summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account during July 2018. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting a significant outgoing transfer of $50,600. The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfickt
persons.context: Steuart Oldfickt is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

persons.name: David N Rodgers
persons.context: David N Rodgers is referenced in relation to an outgoing money transfer of $50,600 from the account.

connections.description: Steuart Oldfickt and David N Rodgers are connected through a financial transaction involving a transfer from the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $50,600 was made from the account to PNC Bank.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $424,315.00 as of July 1, 2018.
An outgoing transfer of $50,600.00 was made to PNC Bank on July 11, 2018.
The ending balance of the account as of July 31, 2018, was $0.00.
Service charges for the statement period totaled $50.00.
The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.
